plot: Remember "Beat the Clock?" Remember "People Are Funny?" Well this show is a blend of the two types of game show. As host, Mark Curry knows everything about everyone in the audience, as well...
plot_en: Remember "Beat the Clock?" Remember "People Are Funny?" Well this show is a blend of the two types of game show. As host, Mark Curry knows everything about everyone in the audience, as well...

title: Don't Forget Your Toothbrush
